mapper.select: SELECT ONEDAY_SEQ, NOTE_SEQ, ONEDAY_TITLE, CONTENT, MDATE, ONEDATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER(PARTITION BY SUBSTR(MDATE,1,6) ORDER BY MDATE) rn, ONEDAY_SEQ, NOTE_SEQ, ONEDAY_TITLE, CONTENT, MDATE, ONEDATE FROM CALBOARD c WHERE NOTE_SEQ=#{note_seq} AND SUBSTR(MDATE,1,6)=#{yyyymm}) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 3
